content:
Setting Up Service Replies for Email

Personalize customer service and save agent’s time in just a few steps.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise and Unlimited Editions with the Einstein for Service add-on

Before adding Einstein Service Replies for Email, ensure these conditions are met:

Salesforce Knowledge is enabled and set up in Lightning Experience.
Einstein Generative AI is enabled.
Service AI Grounding is enabled and set up for Knowledge and Case.
The Case.SendEmail quick action is on the Case Page layout.

Enable Service Replies for Email
Allow public knowledge article sharing so that Einstein can access your company’s trusted knowledge content.
Give agents access to Service Replies for Email by assigning them a permission set.
title: Setting Up Service Cloud Service Replies for Email
